title: Body of girl gone missing from Atulugama recovered
body_lines: The body of 9-year old girl who was reported missing from Atulugama, Bandaragama yesterday has been recovered in a marshy land near her home.
Several police teams were deployed to locate the girl following a complaint that she had gone missing since 10.00 am yesterday.
According to the complaint, the girl had gone to a nearby shop to buy some food items and  never returned home.
